_comment_3: This is an annotated example. Your actual config.json won't have these _comment fields.
_IMPORTANT_NOTE: ⚠️ Permission nodes shown here (server.fly, server.kick, etc.) are EXAMPLES ONLY!
_IMPORTANT_NOTE_2: Replace them with actual Hytale permission nodes from your server/plugins.
_IMPORTANT_NOTE_3: Refer to official Hytale documentation and plugin docs for real permission names.
_defaultGroup_info: The group automatically assigned to new players when they join the server

default._group_description: Basic group for all regular players
permissions: _WARNING: The permission examples below (server.*) are PLACEHOLDERS!
_WARNING: Replace with actual permissions from Hytale/your plugins documentation
_partial_wildcard: server.* - grants all permissions starting with 'server.'
_negation: -server.fly - denies flying even if granted by wildcard
default._parents_info: List of parent groups to inherit permissions from
default._prefix_info: Text shown before player name in chat
default._color_codes: &0-9, &a-f for colors | &l for bold | &o for italic | &r for reset
default._example_prefix: &6[VIP] &f - shows gold [VIP] with white space after
default._suffix_info: Text shown after player name in chat
default._example_suffix: &7[Level 50] - shows gray level badge after name
default._priority_info: Higher priority = takes precedence for prefix/suffix display
default._priority_example: If player is in 'vip'(50) and 'helper'(60), helper prefix shows

admin._permissions_note: The * wildcard grants ALL permissions on the server
admin._parents_note: Inherits all permissions from the 'default' group
admin._priority_note: Highest priority - admin prefix always shows

vip._example_group: Example VIP group - customize as needed
vip._IMPORTANT: ⚠️ Replace 'server.*' permissions below with REAL Hytale permissions!
_permission_explanation: ⚠️ These are EXAMPLE permission names only!
Replace with actual permissions from your Hytale server plugins
Check official Hytale documentation for real permission nodes
vip._suffix_note: Shows a gray star after player name

moderator._example_group: Example Moderator group - for server helpers
moderator._IMPORTANT: ⚠️ Replace with actual moderation permissions from your server!
moderator._note: myperms.admin is a REAL permission from MyPermissions plugin

00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._example_user: This is just an example entry
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._username_info: Display name - updated automatically when player joins
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._groups_info: List of groups this player belongs to
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._groups_note: Players inherit permissions from all their groups
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._WARNING: ⚠️ Replace 'example.*' with REAL permission nodes from your plugins!
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._example_1: example.permission - grants this specific player a permission
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000._example_2: -example.denied.permission - denies a permission even if granted by group

_configuration_tips: 2. Use /mpreload after editing this file manually
3. Backups are automatically created in plugins/MyPermissions/backups/
4. Higher priority groups override lower priority for prefix/suffix
5. User-specific permissions always override group permissions
